reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2025
reviews.body: The description says that is a refurbished excellent condition phone, the screen is perfect probably have been reemplased, the phone works good but the condition of the frame and the cameras has a lot of dents and I feel like I been scammed, I will not return the phone just because I bought it has a secondary work phone and I was looking for cheap performance cellphone and I guess you get what you pay for. Just be aware if you buying this as your main cellphone i do not recommend this refurbished ones, they always will have damage on them, I was expecting minor scratches not big damage like I show on the pictures. Another thing when I open the orders to leave this review the same excellent condition phone price was $20 less than I have pay for in les than 4 hours because I ordered at 11am and was delivered in the afternoon prime same day.

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Great product but really bad generic charger 2.1A 10W
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024
reviews.body: The Samsung S21 Ultra has exceeded my expectations in almost every aspect. From its stunning display to its powerhouse performance, this flagship smartphone truly stands out in the crowded market. Let me delve into the details of what makes this device a must-have, while also shedding light on an area that could use some improvement.First and foremost, let's talk about the display. The S21 Ultra boasts a breathtaking Dynamic AMOLED 2X screen with a 120Hz refresh rate, delivering unparalleled clarity and vibrancy. Whether I'm streaming my favorite movies or gaming with friends, every visual detail pops with stunning realism. It's like having a cinema in the palm of my hand.Performance-wise, the S21 Ultra is an absolute beast. Powered by the latest Snapdragon processor (or Exynos depending on the region), coupled with generous RAM, this smartphone effortlessly handles multitasking, gaming, and productivity tasks with lightning-fast speed. Apps launch instantly, and I can seamlessly switch between tasks without any lag or stutter.One of the standout features of the S21 Ultra is its camera system. With a quad-camera setup including a 108MP main sensor, 10x optical zoom, and 100x Space Zoom, this phone lets me capture moments with astonishing clarity and detail. Whether it's a scenic landscape or a close-up shot, the photos turn out sharp and vibrant, even in low light conditions.The sleek design of the S21 Ultra is another aspect that I absolutely adore. From its premium build quality to its ergonomic feel in hand, Samsung has nailed the aesthetics of this device. It's a perfect blend of style and functionality, making it a pleasure to use and show off.However, no device is without its flaws, and in the case of the S21 Ultra, it's the included charger. While the smartphone itself supports fast charging up to 25W, the included 2.1A 10W ONLY charger feels somewhat underwhelming. In today's fast-paced world, where every minute counts, having a more powerful charger would significantly enhance the user experience, allowing for quicker top-ups on the go.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    As Advertised
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
reviews.body: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G, US Version, 128GB, Phantom Black - Unlocked (Renewed) is in Excellent Condition as advertised.  I especially like the 10X optical zoom lens. The cameraâ€™s Night Mode setting is capable of photographing night sky constellations.  The camera is capable of saving photos in RAW format by downloading Samsung's RAW App.  Image resolution of the main 1X 108MP camera lens is more grainy than expected.  I'm not sure if it is just a defective main lens in this camera or as a result of software processes such as pixel binning?  The Gorilla Glass screen should prevent display damages.  I think the curved glass edges makes tempered glass screen protectors difficult to stay on and I'm having issues finding a tempered glass that doesn't greatly reduce the sensitivity for this S21 Ultra's fingerprint scanner.  Overall, an impressively designed smartphone by Samsung.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2025
reviews.body: Starting out, I was super skeptical about getting a used phone online. But, i have to say it met my expectations and I love the phone. The phone itself is amazing. The camera quality is unparalleled by any other that I've seen. And the customizable features are awesome. You can make it YOUR phone. Pairs with other electronics exceptionally well. Processor speed is top notch, everything loads really fast. Downloads take no time. Set up was very easy. All in all, Galaxy S21 Ultra was an incredible investment on my part. Love it.

reviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    I BOUGHT 3 PHONES !READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2025
reviews.body: FIRST CONDITION EXCELLENT:I bought one a month or two ago and out of the box I noticed that some scratches were on the charging port I ordered it in excellent condition other than I haven't had issues with the phone, not laggy, or weird screen problems, multiple times it has fallen out of my pocket with no phone case and hasn't had significant damage all I did was buy a screen protector and it looks exactly as it did when I bought itSECOND CONDITION GOOD:BUT I ORDER A SECOND PHONE for my girlfriend for Christmas and a day or two later a mark appeared on the top right corner and the phone came with a screen protector so we returned that one and bought another one andTHIRD CONDITION EXCELLENT:I had another screen protector that we put on the new one, this time the screen looks wavy, at this time I'm not sure if it's the phone or the screen protector, once we get another screen protector I'll update.

I compared my s21 ultra screen with a friend's s20 ultra and the difference is huge, my display doesnt even seem to peak 90hz at all. Instead of 120hz I am stuck on 60 even with the "adaptive refresh rate" option on. I am disappointed.

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    It's good I suppose
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2024
reviews.body: I bought the phone in the condtion Refurbished - Excellent but its not really giving excellent. I've been using it for almost a week and for the most part it does what it's supposed to do. But the phone screen smells like glue. The battery life is NOT 10hrs like the product specs say. A full charge probably lasts like 6hrsðŸ˜­ But I guess 6hrs can get you through the day. I had an A20s and a full charge on that could last a whole day - 24hrs, so my expectations for the S21 Ultra in that area were not met. The phone also gets a lil too warm for my liking but the phone doesn't alert that it's overheating and battery capacity is still at 5000 mAh so I guess nothing significantly bad happened. Lastly, my phone only came with a cable and no adapter. Had to scavenge for one around the houseðŸ˜­

reviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    I received a refund at least.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2025
reviews.body: As soon as I took the phone out of the box, it was dead. When I tried to turn it on it immediately started to glitch doing a screen flash. I was thinking maybe it just needed to be charged. After I charged it, the screen flashing got worse. I contacted Amazon but Amazon told me to contact the seller. The seller wrote back and said that I was supposed to contact Amazon. So I got the run around for several days. It took almost a month for me to receive my refund but they did refund me in full. I really was disappointed because I was excited about this phone. Now I'm a little wiry about buying a refurbished phone on Amazon anymore. But 3 stars for the refund.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Great Product
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2025
reviews.body: I was VERY skeptical buying a previously owned cell phone, but I needed a secondary device for a cell phone game that I play and didn't want to spend another $1,600+ for a brand new phone. There were different tiers of condition to choose from and I paid extra for one rated "Excellent". It obviously did not come in original packaging, but I was beyond impressed that it looked like a completely brand new phone! It works great. The battery life is like new and I'm pushing it to the max playing demanding games for long periods. This was a great value and I'm very happy with this purchase. 5 stars, would buy again.

Both phones did not work and I could not send them back for over 9 months but......ALMOST 1 YEAR AFTER I PURCHASED 2 of them, these guys TOOK BOTH PHONES BACK and FIXED THEM for free. EVERYBODY: This is what customer service is all about, these people are MY people and I will buy again from them.THANKS !!

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Phone is much better than I expected so far
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2024
reviews.body: So as of now I am writing this review after only 1 full day of owning the phone, and so far it seems to be nearly perfect. Now I say nearly because it definitely had one or two things here or there that gave me iffy feelings at first. One example of this is that there were very mild scratches on the side of the camera bump, and while normally that would bother me a lot more, I didn't mind it too much since it wasn't effecting the phones performance, and I put a case over it anyway so I don't see them now. I inserted the sim card from my old phone and it all seems to work just fine with no issues that I am able to see as of this moment, though I hear stories of phones sometimes giving up on the sim card after about a month, so I will have to wait and see on that front. And finally I should say that I have always been incredibly skeptical of buying used phones in general, let alone online, but given the price of the phone and the fairly high standards I set for it I am really rather impressed. If anything I just mentioned happens to change sometime in the near future I will definitely come back and change my review accordingly but until then I will 100% recommend this phone for the price

    Wanted to love this phone but...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2024
reviews.body: I really wanted to love this phone but there was one issue that I just couldn't get past & that was the camera. Every picture & video I took, the top came out blurry, no matter what mode it was on or size or anything. I got it for the camera & it was supposed to be refurbished excellent condition. That was the only issue with it though, it looked in excellent condition, with no scratches or anything. If I wasn't so bug on the camera I would have kept it but I had to return it for that issue. I would have exchanged but they didn't have any more in stock I had to do a refund. I would buy from here again, I think I just got a dud. The refund process was quick & easy. I didn't keep long enough to give my opinion on any other aspects of the phone. But like I said, I would buy from here again for sure!!

reviews.title:
2.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Bad quality repairs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2025
reviews.body: Everything was great for a short while until it took a little dip in the bath tub for not even a full second. These are water resistant in 5 feet of water for 30 minutes. Took a fraction of a second in a bathtub to completely take it out of commission. So the work on the phone to renew it obviously did not leave it in excellent condition as stated. They are replacing it for me, so hopefully I get it. It was supposed to arrive 2 days ago. Postponed until today and now today it still hasn't shipped and has been pushed back another 2 days yet again. Meanwhile it's available for two day Prime Shipping and in stock. Yet I'm being told there's a supply issue and a replacement hasn't been shipped after 4 days and says it's gonna take two more. But I just know in two days I'll have an email saying delayed again like has happened each time I got to the day it's supposed to arrive. Overall not super pleased for now. Hopefully my replacement comes soon.

Scrolling through anything was extremely janky and laggy, and while taking photos or videos the phone would lag out and skip certain parts of a video or picture. I ordered another phone through another seller on Ebay this time and the difference between both phones was like night and day. The Ebay phone was extremely smooth and responsive unlike this one.

reviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    It'll do, but doesn't quite meet expectations
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024
reviews.body: I would start by saying it's not really the fault of the second hand retailer of the phone itself, being that I purchased a renewed phone to begin with. That being said, so far I haven't really been impressed with the camera despite it being one of the major selling points of the phone itself. I noticed a small scratch across one of the lenses but surely that doesn't impact the camera quality and focusing ability that much. My phone's camera doesn't seem quite as capable, again could be due to the fact it's renewed. And likewise the battery life seems to be less than half of what it was claimed to be. The phone body itself was pretty beat up but that's not a big deal since it was thrown straight into an OtterBox. I would say it gets the job done and you get what you pay for. I just wasn't as impressed as I was hoping I would be. The seller did a great job packaging the phone and the delivery was prompt. I would just suggest getting a new one, or at least one in "like new" condition if you're considering purchasing one.

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Phone works great! No problems so far
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2024
reviews.body: Phone works great! No problems so far.The phone I got ended up coming with a few scratches along the sides of the phone and some random cat photos someone took but otherwise the phone works perfectly fine. If I had any real complaints it was the fact that the UPS driver that 'delivered' it didn't even get out of his van to knock on the door. I had been waiting for the phone and checking my package tracking only to get told a delivery had been 'attempted' at 1:11 pm.But there was nothing on either of my doors that indicated that they had actually came and knocked on the door. In fact I heard no knocks at all. So they really came to the house, saw they couldn't leave it in the mailbox and took it to the Autoparts store up the street. Not cool.But back to the phone, everything's been working great for a few weeks so far. So i'm pretty happy with it. S-pen functionality is really good too. I'm glad my roll of the dice didn't end with a crappy phone since I badly needed a new one.

    Great so far BUT...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2024
reviews.body: The phone seems to be great so far. I don't recall seeing any scratches or wear on the phone. It also works great internally so it is truly unlocked!However the charger that came with the phone did not work at all. The charger cord seems to work when paired with another base, but the base seems to be the problem. It's a good thing that I had another wall piece/base to use!Also the cord does not support fast charging. When the chord was attached tp a fast charging base, it would slowly transition from 1.5 hours to 5.5 hours until full charge.Although the phone is renewed, I do expect to be given a proper cord and wall piece as I did not get the full value of my money spent in that regard. Otherwise the phone works great so far. Will update if anything changes.

reviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Fast battery drain
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2024
reviews.body: I've had this phone for 2 days now. The phone looks great and works as expected. Unfortunately,  I'm not impressed with the battery life. I know overall the S21 battery is an issue but this one drains quickly. I'm going to hang on it for a couple more days and may have to return it. It drains to dead off in 5 to 6 hours.Update 5/12/24.....The battery life never improved. Battery got very warm during charging but thought I would just get battery replaced for $100 and not worry about shipping it back and getting credit and all that stuff. Last week I fell into a pool with phone in pocket and immediately pulled it out. Phone wouldn't turn on after that at all. Got it diagnosed for $45 and result was a cooked motherboard. Not the ending I was hoping for. This also is not the fault of the seller in no way at all. The only complaint I have us I wish they would of caught the fact of the battery issue plus the fact it took longer to receive from Amazon than at first stated. I will order another one from Amazon and take a chance since in the past 4 phones I've ordered I never had an issue.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Excellent 2nd phone screen scratches
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2024
reviews.body: Ordered two s21 ultras replacing S8+. Couple inches longer than S8+. Many changes since S8+ but much still the same. Data transfer, did twice did not send everything. Hubs wanted to keep images/vids on old phone so he chose dont send images/videos. Moving US Cellular ESim was easy! Took 1 minute! Only issue is USC network for new phones is not their warp network, had to go back to lightspeed. Which is ok bc were on wifi mostly. Hubs phone has 5 small scratches on screen near buttons. Amazon wont give discount only choice is to return.. so "excellent" condition was not totally true for 2nd phone same seller. S8+ became unusable super slow always deleting videos or phone froze. Happy to see everything moved over and still tons of room! Two changes..no headphone jack, or SD card expansion. Keeping old phone can use w wifi or store photos. Got a pen for about $10 nice to create note, reminder, handwrite to text. Overall excellent so far!

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Not technically unlocked
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.body: Well, after 2 days of waiting to replace a broken pixel 6a during the start of the school year, the day finally arrived when I got it in the mail. I went for the excellent option, and I'd say it was worth the extra. No major scratches, a little dirty but that's okay. However, when I went to turn in this beautiful powerful behemoth, I saw the dreaded At&T logo. After hours of fiddling with the sim card trying to get it to accept my at&t unlocking code, I finally got it to work (without putting in my code?). I managed to disable most of the at&t bloatware but it's still there alright and will probably haunt me. But it connected to Metro by T-Mobile just fine after a online transfer of IMEIs. It works perfectly, the fastest phone Ive ever owned and battery seems to be pretty darn good considering the age of the phone. The 100x zoom is crazy but the camera will need fiddling to get those perfect shots to compete with the pixel. Good phone, not so great experience setting up the phone. Plus is a fast charger was included.

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Phone still linked to previous owners account - updated 4/25
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2024
reviews.body: Product was in usable condition as expected of a pre-owned phone. I wouldn't call it "renewed" though as it seems it was processed direct into circulation. Backing/bevel was very scratched (not the issue) the problem comes when I went to add service to the device, turns out it was never removed from the previous owners account and as such could not be set up to be used by anyone but them.UPDATE:was sent a replacement device within a week. The new device is in near new condition with only one minor scratch and I was easily able to transfer my service to it without issue - changed rating to 4 star

reviews.body: I got the refurbished:excellent and it arrived within a week. It's in very good condition. No scratches at all, basically like a brand new phone. Love it.

reviews.title:
2.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Loved It Until...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
reviews.body: So I absolutely loved this phone for the first 8 months I owned it. I took the time to find the best case for the optional spen (supcase UB Pro), and having the s pen with this phone was an absolute game changer for my organization and photo editing skills...so much functionality. Loved it, especially the handwritten notes you can jot down without having to even turn the phone on.So it was all going great, until it slipped out of my hand and fell 4 inches into a clean toilet bowl. I fished it out right away and dried it off, but I knew the phone comes with an IP68 rating and I had a spigen Neoflex screen protector and the UB Pro case, so I figured my phone would be more than fine. With the protection rating of the bare phone PLUS all the extra protection I carried it in, in my head I was more than fine....Guess again. Phone shorted out within 20 minutes and I got the green screen of death at startup. Completely fried. So that really socks. What the hell is the point of IP68 if a 4" drop-slide into some water bricks the phone? I have no idea but hopefully my testimony will be a warning to some: treat this phone as if any water will absolutely destroy it, because it just might. I'm still trying to figure out how to sign into my Samsung account on another device without having this one available, because of Samsungs 2FA they ONLY want to send a code to my s21U, which is bricked. So far Samsung customer service has been completely inept

reviews.title:
2.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Beware of used equipment where no warranties protect you from known flaws in the equipment
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
reviews.body: Read reviews before buying used equipment that has no warranty. The S21U has well known wifi problems where connections drop, speed is terrible, etc. The reviews are out there. Stupidly, I bought this without researching as it was an unplanned replacement for an excellent S10 that didn't do so well when dropped.This is my last Samsung product. The S21 is like the 15-20th model. Previous models had no issues with network interfaces and for this to happen widely with a newer tech model shows serious issues with engineering and QC. Goodbye Samsung! Apple is no longer alone in my banned product list.

reviews.title:
2.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2025
reviews.body: The fun frame came in excellent condition no scratches anywhere no dings anywhere the only problem with this phone is that the screen doesn't know what black is and it's more of a greenish gray when it's on a black screen. Even though it's their fault they won't replace the screen or offer to at least pay half for a new one. And after a day of using it the back broke by putting to much pressure on it..

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2024
reviews.body: Ordered excellent condition but interms of appearance it had a few dents on the chassis nothing too noticeable once I dropped a case on it was looking all brand new . The unit performs like new and is generally of sound quality. I havent had any challenges with it heating up whle charging or anything like that. It locks and unlocks perfectly and so far has a very good battery life.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Fabulous camera with optical zoom lens.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2024
reviews.body: Friend recommended buying an amazon renewed phone as long as it was rated excellent. Took his advice and happy that I did. Phone looked brand new. After 3 weeks no problems. Camera definitely is optical zoom at 3x & even a bit higher. At 10x still gets great photos and will go up to 100 but that is almost unrecognizable. When I don't know how to do something I ask Google and get the perfect answer. Am not dropping calls like I did with a Motorola phone that was much less expensive. Here's hoping I have many years of enjoyment out of this phone and camera. Now July 25th and I am still completely happy with the phone and Camera. I've taken it on vacation and thrilled with the results. Would not know it was renewed at all. Still have till September to return it if I need to. What a deal. Would recommend anybody to try and get a renewed that is rated excellent with four plus Stars.

Works Great! And almost No scratches! Looks pretty brand New to me! I'll keep it updated after a few months or so! To see how it's working for my mom!

Did some research on my laptop, turns out this is a common problem with the phone if it uses a non OEM screen. Since I bought this used, I'm guessing it had the screen replaced. I called up Amazon helpdesk and they walked me through the return process for the phone, case, and screen protector.

It's got an art app, you can copy an object from a photo and copy it on another almost seamlessly. The camera has AI tech. The front camera is very vivid. Camera is fantastic quality all around which is my go to when buying a new phone. Highly recommend especially for the price. Cheaper than best buy for the exact same model.

reviews.title:
2.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Very cheap back and front glass
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2024
reviews.body: The phone came fast and looked to be in really good condition. At first I was very pleased with the purchase. Everything worked perfectly. But then once night the phone slid out of my shorts pocket as I got out of my car. It literally slid down the side of my seat and down the cars door frame and then landed on the ground. My car is about 5.5 inches off the ground, and due to how it slid out of my pocket and down my cars door frame it was essentially a drop of 5.5 inches and the front screen cracked and stopped working and the back cover shattered and started coming apart. I've dropped phones from the top of a refrigerator that took less damage than this phone did from 5 inches. I bought the same model of phone and it is much stronger than whatever glass these guys used to refurbish the phone with. I've never seen anything so fragile in my life.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Perfect!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
reviews.body: Never bought a used Phone from Amazon, but I needed one asap for work.Aside from the driver TOSSING my package to my door from 10 feet away.... the phone is perfect.I ordered an "excellent condition" Galaxy S21 Ultra. There are ZERO defects of any kind.  No scratches,  no Knicks, no wear on the corners.  Not even the slightest tiniest little scratch on the screen. This phone legit looks like it was never used.Just a side note,  I'm coming from am S20+ that has SD card slot.  All galaxies after S20 DO NOT HAVE SD CARD SLOTS.  So get the memory size you think you'll need.  I had a 128gb in my S20 and was almost full,  but that was 4 years of use with no factory resets.I would definitely buy again and recommend to anyone that needs a used Phone.

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Returned a dud and got a Gem!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.body: The first one that came to me had a problem with its battery that caused the phone to restart every 10-or-so minutes so I had to send it back. It was annoying to have to call in for the issue, as the app wouldn't process a return of thos item.That said, Amazon customer service straightened it right out and had a second device there the next morning.The second one is awesome- flawless performance and no cosmetic damage at all.Take the time to thoroughly test your used device before accepting it, but this is a great discount service.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Great Phone
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.body: After buying another exact same phone, this phone came with a good battery and functioning fine.Product was in great shape, scratch on the back but I do not care.I had a Moto G Power before this phone, this phone has much better reception and can connect to a computer or TV.The video will record at 120fps, so the camera is really quite good, again this is not why I bought the phone because I have dedicated cameras.  I wish there was a good PDF on how to use the camera, the Samsung user guide gives just basics, not a user guide for using the product.It took me hours at the Verizon store for the clerk to get the phone on my Verizon account. I was lucky to get a clerk that stuck with it, I tipped him $40.00 for a good job. Previous to the Verizon clerk getting the phone into the Verizon system, the voice mail icon would not show up if I had a voice mail, thus I missed calls.Great product once up and running!

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Amazing Phone for $300!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
reviews.body: Gotten the phone next day, looks brand new, had a pre installed screen protector which looked from a A14 which left a lot of residue after I took it off, but that wasn't a big deal. The battery life is way better compared to my previous s20 ultra, the camera is purely amazing with 100x zoom, the performance is immaculate with the snapdragon 888 processor. It works perfectly with my AT&T Sim card, it sadly doesn't support super fast charging 2.0 compared to my galaxy s20 ultra, however still charges super fast. Hasn't got any scratches yet, but I've only had it for a month. And there is no carrier lock, however once the phone provisioned to my AT&T Sim, it wouldn't work with CDMA such as Verizon whom I use for my work number. Overall 5 stars easy!

reviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    For 450 bucks I expected a little better...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.body: The phone came out of the box filthy beyond belief. I scraped chucks of dirt, ear wax and oils out of this phone. It doesn't look like it was even slightly wiped down. I completely understand what (renewed) means, However this does not looked renewed. It looks like someone took this phone and just threw it in the box with a 450$ price tag. makes me worry what all was actually done to "renew" the phone. Has typical small scuffs on side and edges of phone. To be expected for a used phone. after wiping off all the smudges and finger prints it had on it out of box, the glass does looks good with no visible scratches or hair line cracks. The phone appears to be working as of now however I will update if any other issues come up.  So far out of box impression is it looks like a 100$ pawn shop phone.  For 450$ after taxes I would have like to see at least a little care taken to clean it up.

    Nice for the money
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.body: Device arrived just as described. Very good condition and unlocked. Phone has a nice quality feel and weight to it. Doesn't feel or look cheap at all like some other manufacturers phones do that are built with plastic. Phone was fast and clear once I activated it and uploaded all of my data. Purchaed this phone in an emergency to replace my then current device which was starting to glich. So far I am very happy with this choice. Planning on upgrading from this device to the new S23 Ultra soon. I'd give this seller my business again in the future based on this experience.PS: I gave the fingerprint reader only 2 stars simply because I personally do not ever use biometric features on my devices and can not provide any opinion.
